name: Telegraf Host Metrics
description: This INTRO dashboard displays examples of data from a standard collectd installation.  The data is SAMPLE-only.

sources.name: Total
sources.query: 100 - avg(ts("cpu.usage.idle", source=${host} and not cpu=cpu-total), sources)

charts.name: Load scaled by number of CPUs

sources.name: New Query
sources.query: ts("mem.*" and not "mem*percent" and not mem.total, source=${host})

charts.name: Disk Free vs. Disk Used (Overall) Trend
